sendMessage(“You have received the starter kit! !”);
starter = 1;

}
}

item.title: ::starter 1 time only code
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“starter”)){
if ((starter <= 1));
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Is a greedy twat who got a blackmark");

}

Pretty sure you got the 'if((starter >= 1)); Wrong… Its actually:
if((starter<=1)); Try that and see if it works. Thanks…!

Read full topic
